welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Reja, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that La Reja has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting EPA_WiFi and entering the password provided by the airport staff.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main international terminal for arrivals and departures.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary international terminal for departures only.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Domestic terminal for all flights within Argentina.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, handling domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
